thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Gail Nottenburg
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Gail Nottenburg

author: Gail Nottenburg
title: Gail Nottenburg
text: Robin Sabine worked with us to understand what most interested us about visiting Costa Rica, then started providing possible itineraries. We worked back and forth until the perfect trip was planned; it took a surprisingly short amount of time, partly because she is so familiar with all the various options. When we took the trip she planned, it was delightful! We went places we would never have known about otherwise (nor would we have had any idea how to get there) and had the trip of a lifetime. All the transfers were arranged for us and everything went off without a hitch.
